name: Pareteum
description: Pareteum's mobile core network platform utilizes virtualized SDN and NFV software technologies enabling mobile operators and MNVOs to eliminate complexity, speed time to market and improve ROI. Pareteum Corporation is a leading Global provider of mobile networking software and services. Our mission is to provide a single solution to the problem of fully enabling and securing the Mobile Cloud.Pareteum covers the entire globe, with a customer base and network of partners in every continent. Rapid Deployment of Solutions for: CSPs, MVNO providers, IoT providers and Enterprise Fully operational services @ the Speed of Need! Pareteum’s secure software and services enable customers to achieve business growth and scaling
